name: The Calm: A She-Ra Fan Epilogue
name_original: The Calm: A She-Ra Fan Epilogue
description:
We must be strong - but what happens when you can't?

Adora and the Best Friend Squad have won the war: prosperity has once again returned to Etheria after a terrible struggle against Hordak Prime and the Horde, and the land has finally settled into a time of peace and harmony. 

But Adora experiences a rude awakening when a visitor from the past threatens the calm of her new life...

A 1-2 hour, slice-of-life, mini-adventure centered on Catra and Adora and dealing with normal life after the war. Features spoilers for the animated series (it is an epilogue, after all).

An entirely fan-made, labor of love for the creators, and fans of She-Ra and the Princesses of Power animated series. 

(This is my first crack at making a visual novel -- most of the story, backgrounds, character art, title slides, and design of the game all done by me! Special thanks to my friend, R, who was there to bounce ideas off of and even wrote part of the prologue!)

If you'd like to support me and my future projects, feel free to tip me on my ko-fi!: https://ko-fi.com/candaceaprillee

This visual novel is in no way affiliated with Dreamworks or the official creative team behind She-Ra and the Princesses of Power. I do not own the rights to these characters or settings. Music and sound credits are listed in the game menu's About page.
